attributes.action: bring in line the pay and conditions of serving MP's with other public sector workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of the UK petition that MP's should be bound by the pay conditions of other public sector workers as follows;
1) Performance related pay.2) Minimum rate of overtime and where appropriate time back rewarded.3) Expenses will only be paid on production of receipts and these shall be limited to public transport costs and food bills (applicable only when working over prescribed hours).4) Pay increases under the rate of inflation at the discretion of the public and these shall be staged.5) New powers to remove greedy under performing sleezy MP's.
